name: The Depths (itch) (MangoMalarkey)
description:
Inspired by the classic game Myst, here is a short experience presenting a number of puzzles for you to solve. With a graphics style that looks like the good old days, this game hopes to ignite your nostalgia.

The Depths is a first person puzzle game set on a small island. Enter into the depths of the mountain to disable the mechanisms that could destroy all our lives.

Controls wtih WASD and mouse. Click on things to interact with them. Use escape to go back.
